name: Vampire Frenzy
description:
You play as a vampire that has been locked away in your crypt.  After 50 long years without feeding, you manage to break free and unleash your wraith upon the village that has imprisoned you.  The king is within his castle walls, thinking he is safe.....until now.

People who have worked on the game.
v0dka - Developer
Stevejones92 - Developer
Crow3D - Sound designer/Artist
Kideya - Artist
bmarko01 - Artist
